comments:
When attempting to start a debug session by clicking Run->Debug->C/C++ Local Application->New Launch configuration I get the following error:

An error has occurred. See log for more details.

I have attached the log entry. Got the same results with Eclipse 3.2/CDT 3.1.1 and Eclipse 3.2/CDT 3.1.0. I also tried running with J2RE21.4.2_12. I get the same error when trying to run using Run->Run->New Launch Configuration.


eclipse.buildId=I20061102-1715
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=solaris, ARCH=sparc, WS=gtk, NL=en
Command-line arguments:  -os solaris -ws gtk -arch sparc

Error
